summary: This document is a subpoena from the Federal Bureau of Investigation to Experian Information Solutions, Inc., requesting comprehensive credit reports, fraud alerts, and related financial documents pertaining to Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes a request to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subpoena requests all credit reports, fraud alerts, and related documents pertaining to her, including accounts, addresses, and personal identifying information.

persons.name: Mier
persons.context: Listed as the contact for questions regarding the subpoena, identified as a Forensic Accountant and Special Agent.

locations: Experian Information Solutions, Inc. 701 Experian Parkway Allen, Tx 75013
Federal Bureau of Investigation New York, NY 10278
keyFacts: The FBI issued a subpoena to Experian for comprehensive financial records on Ghislaine Maxwell.
The requested information includes credit reports, fraud alerts, accounts, addresses, personal identifiers, and credit inquiries.
The document emphasizes the need for confidentiality, requesting Experian not to disclose the existence of the subpoena to third parties to preserve the investigation.
The contact for the subpoena is a Forensic Accountant and Special Agent named Mier.
The document indicates an active financial investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell by the FBI.
